name: Soul Warrior Merope - Soaring Soul
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 40.

Soul Warrior Merope - Soaring Soul is a resource management game in the guise of an infinite scrolling shoot 'em up. Manage your ships fuel, ammo and shields in order to make Merope's ship survive longer but be careful the more points you collect the faster enemies spawn and resource prices increase.

You can use  the 1,2 and 3 keys on your keyboard as an alternative for the mouse.
